title: Game wont connect to server
body: I went to go into a match, the game took me out of the loading screen and a pop up said that the gme could not connect to the server, please check your internet and try again. but my internet is fine, everything else on my laptop works, except league of legends. help me please.

replies.body:
The internet can be hella weird sometimes. Even though you're still able to browse the internet, it doesn't mean that your network is able to get to certain servers or websites. It sounds like this might be the case since you're still able to post here, but your network still isn't able to reach our servers for some reason. 

Let's make sure that this isn't happening due to some odd network settings first before we start getting into more difficult troubleshooting steps. Hit up our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and make sure to go through all the steps. Let me know if that isn't able to help though!
